price: 20. Y hemos dispuesto en ella diferentes medios para vuestra subsistencia y para aquellos cuyo sustento no depende de vosotros.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
